code: import{SELECT_PROJECT,FILTER_PROJECT}from'../actions/actionTypes';import{filterEvents}from'../utils/redux';function projectArea(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SELECT_PROJECT:if(action.content.conditions==='')return state;return Object.assign({},state,action.content);case FILTER_PROJECT:var newState=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(state));var newEvents=filterEvents(newState.conditions,action.content.allEvents);newState.events=newEvents;return newState;default:return state;}}export default projectArea;
